name: HabitatRiskAssessmentPre
description: Before running the HRA model, it is necessary to concatenate and rate all applicable criteria information. This can be accomplished by running the Preprocessor tool, then editing the resulting CVSs. If you have already run the model, or have the ‘habitat_stressor_ratings’ directory from a previous HRA Preprocessor run, you may skip this step and proceed to running the Habitat Risk Assessment tool.

inputParams.name: Species_Habitat_Shapefile__zipped_
inputParams.description: Zipped shapefile for a habitat/species of interest
inputParams.label: Species/Habitat Shapefile

inputParams.name: Stressors_Shapefiles__zipped_
inputParams.description: Zipped shapefiles representing human stressors for the habitat/species of interest
inputParams.label: Stressors Shapefiles (zipped)

inputParams.name: Exposure_Criteria__comma_separated_
inputParams.description: Choose at least 1 criteria for each category below, and at least 4 total. Exposure criteria apply to the overlap between provided habitats and stressors, or species and stressors being used within this model run. These criteria will be applied to the exposure portion of habitat risk.
inputParams.label: Exposure Criteria (comma-separated)

inputParams.name: Consequence__Sensitivity__comma_separated_
inputParams.description: Sensitivity criteria apply to the overlap between provided habitats and stressors, or species and stressors being used within this model run. These criteria will be applied to the consequence portion of habitat risk.
inputParams.label: Consequence: Sensitivity (comma-separated)

inputParams.name: Consequence__Resilience__comma_separated_
inputParams.description: Resilience criteria apply ONLY to the habitats or species being used within this model run. These criteria will be applied to the consequence portion of habitat risk.
inputParams.label: Consequence: Resilience (comma-separated)

inputParams.name: Use_Spatially_Explicit_Risk_Scores_in_Shapefile__comma_separated_
inputParams.description:
Checked: checking this box indicates that model should use criteria from provided shapefiles

Unchecked (default): do NOT use spatial criteria from provided shapefiles
inputParams.label: Use Spatially-Explicit Risk Scores in Shapefile
inputParams.tooltip: Use Spatially-Explicit Risk Scores in Shapefile

inputParams.name: Spatially_Explicit_Criteria_Folders__zipped_
inputParams.description: Zipped folders containing shapefiles for spatially-varying criteria scores
inputParams.label: Spatially-Explicit Criteria Folders (zipped)
